ModMetaData.name: Statue of Colonist
ModMetaData.author: 民火
ModMetaData.description:
Add statue of colonist that can be created on sculptor's table. The design of the statue is randomly determined from colonists or presets at the completion of creation(can edit it). This MOD is powered by Harmony Patch Library.
